keyword: calories in 1 cup of jasmine rice
title: Calories in 1 Cup of Jasmine Rice
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 cup of jasmine rice, including carbs, protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for your meals.
h1: Calories in 1 Cup of Jasmine Rice
assumptions: Cooked white jasmine rice, long-grain, steamed or boiled in water, no added salt, oil, or seasonings; ~158 g per cup.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cooking method, water absorption, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of cooked jasmine rice provides ~205 kcal and 44.5 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup cooked jasmine rice?
faqs.a: About 205 kcal for 1 cup of plain cooked jasmine rice.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 1 cup of jasmine rice?
faqs.a: Approximately 44.5 g carbs, with 0.6 g fiber and minimal sugars.

faqs.q: Is jasmine rice high in protein?
faqs.a: No, it has about 4.3 g protein per cup; it's mostly carbs.

faqs.q: Calories in uncooked vs cooked jasmine rice?
faqs.a: Uncooked is denser: ~680 kcal per cup dry, but expands when cooked.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in jasmine rice?
faqs.a: Steaming or boiling keeps it low-cal; frying or adding oil increases by 40+ kcal per tsp.
